data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure Index, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: BPUA02
variable.description: Ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: ARMSBP33
variable.description: Redefined supine brachial systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: ABI34
variable.description: Ankle brachial index, visit 3 (definition 4) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: ABIV3
variable.description: Ankle brachial index measured at visit 3 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]
variable.value: Ankle Brachial Index not measured at visit 3
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 3, but one or both blood pressure values out of range, so no valid value
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 3, but value is invalid
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 3 and has a valid value

variable.name: PAD32
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease, version 3 (definition 2), Ankle Brachial Index <.9 for both genders [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: PAD31
variable.description: Peripheral artery disease, visit 3 (definition 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: LEGANK31
variable.description: Leg for ankle blood pressure at visit 3 (definition 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]
variable.value: UBAA02D (scan date, day)= an even number
UBAA02D (scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31= an odd number for the day part
RSCAN if UBAA02D (scan date, day)= an odd number
UBAA02D (scan date, day) is missing and V3DATE31= an odd number for the day part

variable.name: LEGSAM13
variable.description: Same leg ankle blood pressure at visit 1 and visit 3 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: INCPAD3
variable.description: Incident peripheral artery disease at visit 3 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 3]
